::: contentWrapper
# Can I use multiple Vectors or devices? {#can-i-use-multiple-vectors-or-devices .title}

[](javascript:window.print() "Print this article"){.printArticle
aria-label="Print this Article"}

::: sections
## [I have more than 1 Vector]{style="font-weight: 400;"}

-   [If you have more than 1 Vector, ]{style="font-weight: 400;"}**it is
    possible to link your account to them all**
-   [If you only have 1 device, before using a different Vector, you
    will need to disconnect from the robot you are already connected to
    by opening the **Vector app \> Settings \>
    Disconnect**]{style="font-weight: 400;"}
-   [Digital Dream Labs is creating ]{style="font-weight: 400;"}**a
    world where robots have relationships with people**[. As such,
    Vector will initially not communicate with other Vectors. Nor will
    he communicate with Cozmo or Pets ]{style="font-weight: 400;"}
-   [Vector will sync to the ]{style="font-weight: 400;"}**closest
    cube**

**       
 ![multiple3.png](//d33v4339jhl8k0.cloudfront.net/docs/assets/5e3f0b1e2c7d3a7e9ae777f5/images/5e7d76f02c7d3a7e9ae9e343/img-25345-1585280587-1726799170.png){width="191"
height="375"} ![multiple2.png](//d33v4339jhl8k0.cloudfront.net/docs/assets/5e3f0b1e2c7d3a7e9ae777f5/images/5e7d76f02c7d3a7e9ae9e344/img-25345-1585280587-1368881733.png){width="191"
height="375"} ![multiple1.png](//d33v4339jhl8k0.cloudfront.net/docs/assets/5e3f0b1e2c7d3a7e9ae777f5/images/5e7d76f02c7d3a7e9ae9e345/img-25345-1585280587-175685751.png){width="190"
height="374"}**
:::

------------------------------------------------------------------------

::: sections
## [I have more than 1 device]{style="font-weight: 400;"}

-   [If you have more than one device, ]{style="font-weight: 400;"}**it
    is possible** [to log into your account on both devices but if both
    devices have the Vector app open and in the foreground, both will
    try to connect to Vector]{style="font-weight: 400;"}
-   Since only 1 device can be associated with 1 Vector at any time, you
    will need to **close the Vector app on one of your devices**
:::
